text: We talked about selectors in CSS In today's video, we will look at selectors more closely and I will tell you some things about selectors which we will actually use when we build websites So with high energy, do like this video and write Sigma badge OP in the comment section below Let's go to the computer screen Let's roll the intro So guys, before I move forward in this video I want to take you to the GitHub where I gave you the source code and this time I will not ask you to access the source code but I will show you what selectors we have already talked about Here I have made a folder named video 35 and I will write CSS more on selectors and let's make it more on CSS selectors it will be better Now I will tell you some more things about selectors which is important So here I write style and let's start So here I will write div.boxes and after this I will write div.box and here I will write box and let's say I want to replicate this and after replicating, let's say I want to see how it will look and I will open it in the browser and it will look something like this If I want to select the first element So I can select the first element by doing first child So if I write here dot boxes and I write here first child So I can select its first child here and make the background color red I have to do dot box here So basically what happens it means that if dot box is the first child of your parent then the background color will be red Now see it will be on the first one and I wrote boxes first So what happened It was on the whole It was on the whole boxes because boxes is the first child of the body So this is how it should be seen Many people get confused in this But I hope you have understood this After this I will say that I can select the first letter of the dot box In fact, I can select its first line If it has a lot of text inside it and I can say make the color yellow and for this I will comment this one and maybe I have to put a big lorem here lorem 455 I know it's a lot of text Now see the first line is of yellow color and the rest of the lines are of default black color So I can select the first line from CSS and if I make it smaller Now see the first line is rendered in the device That's what it means and it doesn't mean anything else It's not that the first line is so many words or so many characters or let's say not so much width First line of your device Now see I have made its color yellow It's not visible somewhere But you got the point I am trying to make its color black and see it changed to black I will make it red Now see it's changing to red If you can see it's changing to red So you can select the first line like this If I come back We talked about the element selector We talked about the class selector ID selector was very simple We talked about the child selector If it is a direct child of P div Then it will be selected like this We talked about the descendant selector If P is present anywhere in div Then these properties will be applied Then we have universal selector Which selects everything One more thing related to universal selector I want to show you here And that is if I want Everything in the boxes Everything in the boxes I will do this ctrl z I will do ctrl z I will make the text a little smaller I am first box And I will comment this too For now and I will say That the box I will write here Inside the boxes Inside the boxes All the elements What do you do Color it blue So what will happen Dot box star means It will be applied to all the elements in the boxes And let us say I say Border 2 pixel solid black Do something like this So you see here It will be applied Border 2 pixel solid black So inside the boxes To select all the elements You can do something like this Dot box star You can select See if I talk about selectors I can say a lot of selectors But I just want to teach you As much as is necessary And what will I do to do this That for you I will choose only those selectors Which will be used the most When we make our real world websites Now I tell you about an attribute selector I told you in the middle of the course But let us say I put here in div Let us say I put Data color is equal to primary Okay, I put primary here Now I want data color Where primary is there Say margin top is applied So I can use attribute selector in this way And I can say Data color is equal to If primary is there So what do you do So you do let us say margin top 45 pixels And where data color Will be primary, there margin top will be applied You can see here So if I see this, then see data color was primary And margin top is applied here You have seen here margin top is applied And here border is also applied So I have put margin and border If I do padding by the way, then it will be applied from inside Let me tell you this too So you will see the border above So see margin top is applied in this element Because data color was primary on it You can do this for any attribute It is not necessary to do for data attributes You can do it for even classes You can do it for ID Now you can group So if I want to put this thing in all paragraphs In all A's In all box classes And in all data color primary So I can do grouping in this way So this is grouping of selector And its effect will be like this It will be applied in all Because I have selected all So this is
